wikipedia_page.main: William Wiseman (18 October 1896 – 1981) was a Scottish amateur footballer who played as a left back in the Scottish League for Queen's Park and later served on the club's committee. He was capped by Scotland at amateur and full international levels.

response: *Willie Wiseman (1896–1979), Scottish footballer (Queen's Park and Scotland)
